proposal.recommendationDescription: Outsource certain tasks to reduce costs and free up resources for other areas such as research and development. This option would save $50,000 per year but also carries a high risk of decreased control over quality and consistency. The timeline is flexible with the ability to complete outsourcing in 6-12 months depending on the project.
